Background

Work Experience

  • Marie-Curie Researcher (2018 - present) at Centre for Digital Music, Queen Mary University of London
  • Researcher (2017) at Machine Translation group at FBK, Italy
  • Software Developer (Summer 2014, Summer 2016) at Google Summer of Code
  • NLP Researcher (2015-2016) at Language Technologies Research Center, IIIT Hyderabad, India

Education

  • Ph. D. (expected 2021) at School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science, QMU London as part of the MIP-Frontiers programme.
  • M. S. by Research (2017) in Computer Science and Engineering from IIIT Hyderabad
  • B. Tech. (2014) in Computer Science and Engineering from IIIT Hyderabad

Interests

  • Indian classical music (Bansuri), jazz guitar, classical piano
  • Hiking, travelling, yoga
  • Swimming, cycling, table tennis
  • GitHub
